q: COBRA primarily provides what?
choices: Continuation of employer coverage after qualifying events
explain: COBRA lets qualified beneficiaries continue group coverage after certain events.
why: COBRA compliance protects both employers and employees.

q: Which notice timing is most accurate for COBRA election?
choices: Election Notice within 44 days of the qualifying event (general rule)
explain: Administrators generally have up to 44 days from the event to provide the Election Notice.
why: Late or missing notices create legal exposure.

q: Which scenario most likely triggers an ERISA fiduciary concern?
choices: Recommending funds with undisclosed comp conflicts
explain: Undisclosed compensation conflicts may breach fiduciary duty.
why: Fiduciary lapses can result in significant regulatory and legal consequences.

q: What best describes SBC?
choices: summary of benefits & coverage required by ACA
explain: Summary of benefits & coverage required by aca.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

q: Which statement about SPD is most accurate?
choices: ERISA summary plan description for participants
explain: Erisa summary plan description for participants.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

q: Which scenario aligns with best practice for HIPAA PHI?
explain: Protected health information privacy rules.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

q: What best describes Medicare credible coverage (Part D)?
choices: notice stating Rx plan is as good as Medicare standard
explain: Notice stating rx plan is as good as medicare standard.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

q: Which statement about QLE is most accurate?
choices: qualifying life event allowing mid‑year change
explain: Qualifying life event allowing mid‑year change.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

q: Which scenario aligns with best practice for PCORI fee?
choices: ACA fee paid by self‑funded plans
explain: Aca fee paid by self‑funded plans.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

q: What best describes 5500 filing?
choices: annual ERISA reporting for applicable plans
explain: Annual erisa reporting for applicable plans.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

q: Which statement about NQTL parity is most accurate?
explain: Non‑quantitative limits under mhpaea.
why: Understanding ancillary features helps employees use benefits effectively.

choices: mental health parity law requiring parity with medical/surgical
explain: Mental health parity law requiring parity with medical/surgical.

choices: qualifying event like termination or reduction in hours
